content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "snow", "quantity": 37, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_leaves", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 56, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "tipped_arrow", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 5, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft an iron_helmet, I need to place 5 iron_ingots in a v shape in the crafting table. Since I have 5 iron_ingots in slot 40, I will first move one to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 37, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_leaves", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 56, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "tipped_arrow", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 40}]
thought: Since I have already placed one iron_ingot in slot 1, I will now place one in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "heavy_weighted_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 37, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_leaves", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 56, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "tipped_arrow", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 40}]
thought: Since I have already placed two iron_ingots in slots 1 and 2, I will now place one in slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 37, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_leaves", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 56, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "tipped_arrow", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}]
thought: Since I have already placed three iron_ingots in slots 1, 2 and 3, I will now place one in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 37, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_leaves", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 56, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "tipped_arrow", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Since I have already placed four iron_ingots in slots 1, 2, 3 and 4, I will now place one in slot 6.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 37, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "birch_leaves", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 56, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_leaves", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "tipped_arrow", "quantity": 55, "index": 31}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}]
thought: Since I have already placed all five iron_ingots in the crafting table, I can now craft the iron_helmet. I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
